content.html: Okay, so. My dad died late Saturday night/early Sunday morning. He had ALS, so we knew it was coming, just not so soon. We were going to go see him in the new year, but now we're having to work out flights and tests and everything. I don't have details. I just miss him.
content.value:
Okay, so. 
My dad died late Saturday night/early Sunday morning. 
He had ALS, so we knew it was coming, just not so soon. 
We were going to go see him in the new year, but now we're having to work out flights and tests and everything. 
I don't have details.
I just miss him.
